languages.text: "{name}, ваше мягкосердечие переступает все границы! Трактовать Лекс Империалис таким образом?" {n}Проктор закрывает ладонью лицо, пряча накатившие эмоции.{/n} "Какие бы слова вы не использовали — это кража, и вы просите меня стать соучастником. Кровь Трона..." {n}Он опускает руку, и его взгляд кажется безгранично усталым.{/n} "Значит, вы ставите меня перед выбором: гибель многих миров или чудовищное попрание закона Его. Да смилуется над нами Император, но я принимаю вашу сторону, Вольный Торговец, — теперь это преступление лежит на нас обоих".

"{name}, your soft-heartedness is beyond the pale! You dare interpret the Lex Imperialis this way?" {n}Solomorne covers his face with the palm of his hand, trying to reign in his emotions.{/n} "No matter what words you may use, this is still theft, and you are asking me to be an accomplice. Throne's blood..." {n}He lowers his hand, and there is an immense weariness in his gaze.{/n} "So, you put before me a choice: the death of many worlds, or a heinous violation of His Law. I am siding with you, and may the Emperor have mercy. This crime now falls on us both, Rogue Trader."

Throne's blood..." {n}He lowers his hand, and there is an immense tiredness in his gaze.{/n} "So you put me before a choice, the death of many worlds or a heinous violation of His law. I am siding with you, and may the Emperor have mercy. This crime now falls on both of us, Rogue Trader."

languages.text: "{name}, Eure Gutherzigkeit ist völlig inakzeptabel! Ihr wagt es, das Lex Imperia so zu interpretieren?" {n}Solomorne bedeckt sein Gesicht mit seiner Handfläche, um seine Gefühle zu zügeln.{/n}"Egal, wie Ihr es ausdrückt, das Ganze bleibt ein Diebstahl und Ihr wollt mich zu Eurem Komplizen machen. Beim Blut des Throns ..." {n}Als er seine Hand senkt, wirkt sein Gesicht unfassbar müde.{/n} "Ihr stellt mich also vor die Wahl: der Tod vieler Welten oder eine ruchlose Verletzung Seines Gesetzes. Ich stehe an Eurer Seite, der Imperator sei mir gnädig. Dieses Verbrechen fällt nun auf uns beide zurück, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "{name}, your soft-heartedness is beyond the pale! You dare interpret the Lex Imperialis this way?" {n}Solomorne covers his face with the palm of his hand, trying to reign in his emotions.{/n} "No matter what words you may use, this is still theft, and you are asking me to be an accomplice. Throne's blood..." {n}He lowers his hand, and there is an immense weariness in his gaze.{/n} "So, you put before me a choice: the death of many worlds, or a heinous violation of His Law. I am siding with you, and may the Emperor have mercy. This crime now falls on us both, Rogue Trader."

Beim Blut des Throns ..." {n}Als er seine Hand senkt, wirkt sein Gesicht unfassbar müde.{/n} "Ihr stellt mich also vor die Wahl: der Tod vieler Welten oder eine ruchlose Verletzung Seines Gesetzes. Ich stehe an Eurer Seite, der Imperator sei mir gnädig. Dieses Verbrechen fällt nun auf uns beide zurück, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."

languages.text: « {name}, votre sensibilité dépasse les bornes ! Comment osez-vous interpréter la Lex Imperialis ainsi ? » {n}Solomorne se couvre le visage de la main en essayant de maîtriser ses émotions.{/n} « Vos belles paroles ne changent pas les faits : il s'agit d'un vol et vous me demandez d'en être le complice. Par le Trône... » {n}Lorsqu'il retire sa main, son regard est empreint d'une immense lassitude.{/n} « Vous m'obligez donc à choisir entre la perte de nombreux mondes ou une odieuse violation de la loi sacrée. Je me range de votre côté, en espérant que l'Empereur m'accordera Sa pitié. Nous sommes tous les deux coupables de ce crime, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "{name}, your soft-heartedness is beyond the pale! You dare interpret the Lex Imperialis this way?" {n}Solomorne covers his face with the palm of his hand, trying to reign in his emotions.{/n} "No matter what words you may use, this is still theft, and you are asking me to be an accomplice. Throne's blood..." {n}He lowers his hand, and there is an immense weariness in his gaze.{/n} "So, you put before me a choice: the death of many worlds, or a heinous violation of His Law. I am siding with you, and may the Emperor have mercy. This crime now falls on us both, Rogue Trader."

Comment osez-vous interpréter la Lex Imperialis ainsi ? » {n}Solomorne se couvre le visage de la main en essayant de maîtriser ses émotions.{/n} « Vos belles paroles ne changent pas les faits : il s'agit d'un vol et vous me demandez d'en être le complice. Par le Trône... » {n}Lorsqu'il retire sa main, son regard est empreint d'une immense lassitude.{/n} « Vous m'obligez donc à choisir entre la perte de nombreux mondes ou une odieuse violation de la loi sacrée. Je me range de votre côté, en espérant que l'Empereur m'accordera Sa pitié. Nous sommes tous les deux coupables de ce crime, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: “{name}，你的心肠实在是太软了，超出该有的界限了！你怎么能这样解释帝国法典？”{n}索罗蒙用手掌捂住了脸，试图克制自己的情绪。{/n}“哪怕再怎么掩饰，这也是盗窃行为，而你现在还要求我当你的帮凶。黄金王座在上啊……”{n}他放下了手，看起来心力交瘁。{/n}“也就是说，你在逼我做出选择：是眼睁睁看着众多世界灭亡，还是犯下令人发指的罪行，违背祂的律法。我愿站在你这边，愿帝皇宽恕我们。如今，这场罪行将由你我二人共同承担，行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: "{name}, your soft-heartedness is beyond the pale! You dare interpret the Lex Imperialis this way?" {n}Solomorne covers his face with the palm of his hand, trying to reign in his emotions.{/n} "No matter what words you may use, this is still theft, and you are asking me to be an accomplice. Throne's blood..." {n}He lowers his hand, and there is an immense weariness in his gaze.{/n} "So, you put before me a choice: the death of many worlds, or a heinous violation of His Law. I am siding with you, and may the Emperor have mercy. This crime now falls on us both, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “{name}，你的心肠实在是太软了，超出该有的界限了！你怎么能这样解释帝国法典？”{n}索罗蒙用手掌捂住了脸，试图克制自己的情绪。{/n}“哪怕再怎么掩饰，这也是盗窃行为，而你现在还要求我当你的帮凶。黄金王座在上啊……”{n}他放下了手，看起来心力交瘁。{/n}“也就是说，你在逼我做出选择：是眼睁睁看着众多世界灭亡，还是犯下令人发指的罪行，违背祂的律法。我愿站在你这边，愿帝皇宽恕我们。如今，这场罪行将由你我二人共同承担，行商浪人。”

languages.text: «¡{name}, su compasión es más que excesiva! ¿Cómo osa interpretar así la Lex Imperialis?». {n}Solomorne se cubre el rostro con la palma de la mano, intentando controlar sus emociones.{/n} «Por más eufemismos que use, esto sigue siendo hurto, y me está pidiendo que sea su cómplice. Por la sangre del Trono...». {n}Agacha la cabeza e identificas un inmenso cansancio en su mirada.{/n} «Me obliga a elegir entre la muerte de múltiples mundos o una violación flagrante de Su Ley. Me pondré de su parte, que el Emperador se compadezca de nosotros. Este delito ahora nos involucra a ambos, Comerciante».
languages.original_text: "{name}, your soft-heartedness is beyond the pale! You dare interpret the Lex Imperialis this way?" {n}Solomorne covers his face with the palm of his hand, trying to reign in his emotions.{/n} "No matter what words you may use, this is still theft, and you are asking me to be an accomplice. Throne's blood..." {n}He lowers his hand, and there is an immense weariness in his gaze.{/n} "So, you put before me a choice: the death of many worlds, or a heinous violation of His Law. I am siding with you, and may the Emperor have mercy. This crime now falls on us both, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «¡{name}, su compasión es más que excesiva! ¿Cómo osa interpretar así la Lex Imperialis?». {n}Solomorne se cubre el rostro con la palma de la mano, intentando controlar sus emociones.{/n} «Por más eufemismos que use, esto sigue siendo hurto, y me está pidiendo que sea su cómplice. Por la sangre del Trono...». {n}Agacha la cabeza e identificas un inmenso cansancio en su mirada.{/n} «Me obliga a elegir entre la muerte de múltiples mundos o una violación flagrante de Su Ley. Me pondré de su parte, que el Emperador se compadezca de nosotros. Este delito ahora nos involucra a ambos, Comerciante».

languages.text: 「{name}、あなたの甘さには呆れるばかりです！レックス・インペリアをそんなふうに解釈するとは、何と無礼な！」{n}ソロモーンは顔を手のひらで覆い、感情を抑えようとした。{/n}「どんな言葉を使おうと、これは窃盗に違いありません。そしてあなたは私に、それに加担しろと言っているのです。玉座の血よ…」{n}彼は手を下ろし、その目には計り知れない疲労が浮かんでいた。{/n}「つまりあなたは私に選択を迫っているのですね。無数の惑星の死か、それとも皇帝陛下の法をおぞましくも踏みにじるか。その上で私はあなたに加担します。願わくば、皇帝陛下の慈悲があらんことを。この罪は、今や私たち二人のものです。ローグトレーダー」
languages.original_text: "{name}, your soft-heartedness is beyond the pale! You dare interpret the Lex Imperialis this way?" {n}Solomorne covers his face with the palm of his hand, trying to reign in his emotions.{/n} "No matter what words you may use, this is still theft, and you are asking me to be an accomplice. Throne's blood..." {n}He lowers his hand, and there is an immense weariness in his gaze.{/n} "So, you put before me a choice: the death of many worlds, or a heinous violation of His Law. I am siding with you, and may the Emperor have mercy. This crime now falls on us both, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、あなたの甘さには呆れるばかりです！レックス・インペリアをそんなふうに解釈するとは、何と無礼な！」{n}ソロモーンは顔を手のひらで覆い、感情を抑えようとした。{/n}「どんな言葉を使おうと、これは窃盗に違いありません。そしてあなたは私に、それに加担しろと言っているのです。玉座の血よ…」{n}彼は手を下ろし、その目には計り知れない疲労が浮かんでいた。{/n}「つまりあなたは私に選択を迫っているのですね。無数の惑星の死か、それとも皇帝陛下の法をおぞましくも踏みにじるか。その上で私はあなたに加担します。願わくば、皇帝陛下の慈悲があらんことを。この罪は、今や私たち二人のものです。ローグトレーダー」

languages.text: "Yumuşak kalpliliğiniz haddini aştı {name}! Lex İmperialis'i bu şekilde yorumlamaya nasıl cüret edersiniz?" {n}Solomorne, duygularını dizginlemeye çalışır vaziyette yüzünü avucuyla kapatıyor.{/n} "Nasıl dediğiniz fark etmez, yaptığınız hırsızlıktır ve benden suç ortağınız olmamı istiyorsunuz. Taht aşkına..." {n}Elini indiriyor, bakışlarında muazzam bir yorgunluk görülüyor.{/n} "Önümde bir seçim var: Ya birçok dünyayı ölüme mahkûm edecek ya da O'nun Kanunu'nu iğrenç bir şekilde ihlal edeceğim. Yanınızdayım. İmparator bana merhamet etsin. Bu suçtan artık ikimiz de sorumluyuz Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: "{name}, your soft-heartedness is beyond the pale! You dare interpret the Lex Imperialis this way?" {n}Solomorne covers his face with the palm of his hand, trying to reign in his emotions.{/n} "No matter what words you may use, this is still theft, and you are asking me to be an accomplice. Throne's blood..." {n}He lowers his hand, and there is an immense weariness in his gaze.{/n} "So, you put before me a choice: the death of many worlds, or a heinous violation of His Law. I am siding with you, and may the Emperor have mercy. This crime now falls on us both, Rogue Trader."

Taht aşkına..." {n}Elini indiriyor, bakışlarında muazzam bir yorgunluk görülüyor.{/n} "Önümde bir seçim var: Ya birçok dünyayı ölüme mahkûm edecek ya da O'nun Kanunu'nu iğrenç bir şekilde ihlal edeceğim. Yanınızdayım. İmparator bana merhamet etsin. Bu suçtan artık ikimiz de sorumluyuz Hür Tacir."
